profile.name: VETRI SELVAN
profile.title: Tekla Modeler | Steel Detailer | Automation Developer
profile.tagline: Crafting intelligent steel models, precision connections, and automated workflows that transform structural engineering from blueprint to reality.

about.heading: About Me
about.description: A passionate Tekla Structures professional with extensive experience in steel modeling, connection detailing, and structural automation. I specialize in transforming complex engineering challenges into precise, efficient digital solutions.

highlights.title: Tekla Modeling Expert
highlights.description: Years of experience in PEB, industrial, and commercial steel structure modeling with Tekla Structures.

highlights.title: Connection Detailing
highlights.description: Specialized in designing and detailing base plates, end plates, moment connections, and more.

highlights.title: Automation Developer
highlights.description: Building custom tools and scripts using Python, C#, and Tekla Open API to automate repetitive tasks.

highlights.title: Industrial Projects
highlights.description: Hands-on exposure to large-scale industrial projects including pipe racks, platforms, and heavy structures.
